text: The Global Biodiversity Information Facility (GBIF) is an organization that provides information about living things. It was started in 2001. Governments pay for the GBIF to work, and GBIF gives the information to whoever wants it. GBIF is the largest data platform for living things in the world, and it is the one that scientists use the most. == References == Category:2001 establishments in Europe Category:Biological databases Category:Organizations based in Denmark
title: Global Biodiversity Information Facility
